caption: Marketplace - Buy Direct Listing
doc: Buy a direct listing on a given NFT marketplace.

AGa.caption: Listing ID
AGa.doc: The listing ID of the NFT listed on a given NT marketplace. This can be returned using the "Get Active Listings" action, Alternatively when a NFT is listed on a marketplace you can save the listing ID returned in the database somewhere.
AGa.name: listing_id

AGb.caption: Quantity
AGb.doc: This only applies to buying ERC-1155 NFTs with a supply greater than 1..
AGb.name: quantity

AGc.caption: Marketplace Contract Address
AGc.doc: The marketplace smart contract address the NFT is listed on.
AGc.name: marketplace_contract_address
